title: Jack Of All Trades

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Kill a player. (1 use)
- Roleblock a player. (1 use)
- Investigate a player's role. (1 use)
- Heal a player. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not target yourself.
- If all your abilities are used, regain 1 use of each.

desc:
Post 939
*I have a trick up my sleeve!*
